roleset.name: fish, through ice
roleset.note: ICEFISH-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, relation to fish.01. No VNcls. (from icefish.01-v)

example.name: all args
example.text: Not sure if it was real clear, but in [the lakes]-1 I have icefished *-1 for walleyes the fish come into shallow water at night.

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Hard *PRO* to ice skate on water , ski when there 's no snow , or ice fish when there 's no ice !
